title: Max
lyrics:
[Intro]
Old man Quill ass is in there by itself
Let's do this
So everybody ready, Bishop?
Hell yeah
Q, steal, steal
[Verse 1]
One in the mornin', got a phone call from his homie
And he told him, "Wake the fuck up 'cause we got a job we must do"
We got the crew, couple of brews and everybody was packin' a tool
"What do I have to do?" he asked, the man in charge responded, "Just be cool"
Go in the alley, hop out the whip and shoot one of the kids with their friends
Popped just like that, and you will be with us 'til the end (The end)
Thought to himself, "Damn, this don't make me a man"
But, he proceeded to open the door and walk up with the .9 in his hand
He took to the car, driver pulled out
Congratulations, you one of us now
He wasn't proud, this life he had, he didn't want it
But he got it, there's no turnin' back
Wishin' that he never touched a MAC
Every day he wakes with a conscious on his back
And now he looks up in the sky like, "Who the fuck am I?"
Just wonderin' and he be askin' God when is his time
Fucked up in the mind since a jit, I know Max
Been through a lot of shit so I be feelin' remorse for the kid
When the violence in others be forcin' him

[Segue]
Freeze, motherfucker
Turn around, turn around, I'm just gonna fuck you
Turn around, motherfucker! Shut the fuck up!
I'm gonna fuck him up! Shut the fuck up!
Please don't shoot me, alright?
Can you just shut the fuck up?
I will kill your ass [?]
[Verse 2]
Next morning he rolling solo on his way to his school
Still thinking about the tool that he used to end somebody's life
He turned around and headed back to his house
He had this mean weight on his shoulder that he had to get out
He walked in and grabbed the gun and sat back in his car
He wants to throw the gun in a river and get rid of his scars
So, he driving and ducking and diving the traffic with graphic visions of what occurred
Not paying attention he slammed on the brake and turned as he hit the curb
Witness approached and called the 911
He was sitting up in his car, more blood than Redrum
It was rolling straight down his cheek
As he thought it was fate that he was 'bout to meet
But with all his strength, he managed to stand up on his two feet
As the ambulance took him away, he wishin' that he gon' live another day
He feelin' like this was the price to pay (Pay) for yesterday
Remorse and sin, they go together
Max learned this lesson for worse or the better
So looks like he's gon' have a couple more storms to weather

[Outro]
We run from the cops, we run from [?]
We run from security guards, we run from old man Quill
And this fuckin' bullshit store when he come with that bullshit gun
All he gotta do is fuckin' run
[?] team, I'm serious
So good, so good
So good, so good
Your love
